All Classes

Class Description
DeltaExperiments
This class provides some numerical experiment of the computation of the Delta of european and digital option using Black Scholes and Bachelier Homogeneous model.
EulerSchemeWithShift
This class implements a Weighted-Monte-Carlo Simulation for the shifted process Xh, that means a process with initalValue = initialValueOfX + h.
EulerSchemeWithShift.ModelName  
EulerSchemeWithShiftTest  
MonteCarloBachelierModelFactoryImplementation  
MonteCarloBachelierModelFactoryImplementationTest
This class tests the implementation of your class.
MonteCarloBlackScholesModelExerciseTest
This is a small test, which you may use for you own experiments.
MonteCarloBlackScholesModelFactoryExampleImplementation
Example for the factory implementation.
MonteCarloBlackScholesModelFactoryImplementation  
MonteCarloBlackScholesModelFactoryImplementationTest
This class tests the implementation of your class.
ShiftProcessModel
This class extends MonteCarloAssetModel and is used as wrapper class for EulerSchemeWithShift instead of MonteCarloAssetModel.
VarianceReductionBachelier
This class uses exercise 1 to value different financial product: - European Call - Digital Option - Asian Option under the Bachelier model:
dS t = μ dt + σ d W t
VarianceReductionBlackScholes
This class uses exercise 1 to value different financial product: - European Call - Digital Option - Asian Option under the black scholes model:
dS t = μ S t dt + σ S t d W t
